title: Interview with Dr. Mike Savage
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Dr. Mike Savage from LSE about his work in the field of social Class. Mike discusses the Great British class survey, his book 'Social class in the 21st Century' and also his 7 tier social class hierarchy scale.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Matthew talks to Dr. Mike Savage from LSE about his work in the field of social Class. Mike discusses the Great British class survey, his book 'Social class in the 21st Century' and also his 7 tier social class hierarchy scale.
